metadata.description: Realistic sample motor products for 4 major manufacturers (ABB, Siemens, WEG, Nidec). 2-3 products per manufacturer with realistic model numbers, specifications, and descriptions. Intended to populate the demo database and demonstrate data richness to potential manufacturer partners.
metadata.disclaimer: These are representative sample products created for demonstration purposes. Model numbers and specifications are modeled after real product lines but may not correspond to exact current catalog offerings. Always verify against manufacturer's official documentation for actual procurement.

products.name: Baldor-Reliance Super-E Premium Efficient Motor
products.description: 5 HP, 4-pole, TEFC, NEMA Premium Efficiency three-phase AC induction motor in a 184T frame. Baldor-Reliance Super-E design with copper rotor bars and Class F insulation for extended life. Suitable for general purpose industrial applications including pumps, fans, conveyors, and machine tools. Inverter-duty rated for use with variable frequency drives per NEMA MG1 Part 31.

temperature_rise.display: 80K (Class B rise within Class F insulation)

products.applicationNotes: General purpose NEMA Premium motor ideal for fan, pump, and conveyor applications in most industrial environments. TEFC enclosure handles dusty, dirty, or outdoor installations. Inverter duty rated for variable speed operation when paired with a VFD. Class F insulation with Class B temperature rise provides thermal margin for long insulation life. Dual voltage design (230/460V) provides installation flexibility. 1.15 service factor per NEMA standards allows occasional 15% overload without damage.

products.name: ABB M3BP 160MLA 4 Process Performance Motor
products.description: 11 kW (15 HP equivalent), 4-pole, IEC 160M frame, TEFC, IE3 Premium Efficiency three-phase process performance motor. Cast iron construction for demanding industrial environments. Designed for continuous operation in process industries including chemical, pulp & paper, and water treatment. Rated for inverter supply per IEC 60034-25.

construction.display: Cast Iron Frame and End Shields

products.applicationNotes: ABB M3BP Process Performance motor designed for demanding process industry applications. Cast iron construction provides superior rigidity and heat dissipation compared to aluminum frame alternatives. IP55 rating standard; IP56 available for washdown environments. Rotatable terminal box provides installation flexibility. Available in IEC and NEMA configurations. Can be configured with ATEX/IECEx certification for hazardous area installations. The M3BP range is ABB's flagship IEC motor line for process industries.

products.name: ABB SynRM IE5 Ultra Premium Efficiency Motor
products.description: 5.5 kW (7.5 HP), 4-pole, IEC 132S frame, IE5 Ultra Premium Efficiency Synchronous Reluctance Motor. Achieves IE5 efficiency class without permanent magnets, using ABB's patented reluctance rotor technology. Requires ABB ACS880 or compatible VFD for operation. Delivers significant energy savings in pump, fan, and compressor applications with variable load profiles.

inverter_duty.display: VFD required - not for direct online start

requires_vfd.display: Yes - ABB ACS880 or compatible VFD required

products.applicationNotes: ABB SynRM technology achieves IE5 efficiency without rare-earth permanent magnets, reducing supply chain risk and cost compared to PM motors. MUST be operated with a compatible VFD (ABB ACS880 recommended). Cannot be started direct-on-line. Delivers the power output of a standard 5.5kW motor in the physical frame size of a 4kW motor, enabling drop-in efficiency upgrades in space-constrained installations. Ideal for pump, fan, and compressor applications where energy cost is a significant portion of total cost of ownership. Payback period on energy savings typically 1-2 years for continuously running applications.

products.name: SIMOTICS GP 1LE2 General Purpose Motor
products.description: 7.5 kW (10 HP), 4-pole, IEC 132M frame, IE3 Premium Efficiency general purpose three-phase induction motor. Part of the SIMOTICS GP (General Purpose) range, designed for standard industrial applications. Aluminum frame construction for light weight and good heat dissipation. Compatible with SINAMICS drives for variable speed operation. Optimized for the global market with multi-voltage, multi-frequency capability.
products.applicationNotes: SIMOTICS GP is Siemens' standard industrial motor for global applications. Lightweight aluminum frame makes it easy to handle and install. Fully compatible with SINAMICS G120 and S120 variable frequency drives. Configurable through Siemens' Drive Technology (DT) Configurator online tool for quick selection. TIA Portal integration enables seamless commissioning in Siemens automation environments. Available with extensive options including brakes, encoders, forced ventilation, and special coatings.

products.name: SIMOTICS SD Severe Duty NEMA Motor
products.description: 25 HP, 4-pole, NEMA 284T frame, TEFC, NEMA Premium Efficiency severe duty three-phase induction motor. SIMOTICS SD (Severe Duty) series designed specifically for the North American market with enhanced protection features including cast iron construction, oversized bearings, corrosion-resistant coating, and IP56 rating. Meets IEEE 841 requirements for petroleum and chemical industry applications.

temperature_rise.display: 105K (Class F rise within Class H insulation)

construction.display: Cast Iron Frame, End Shields, and Conduit Box

products.applicationNotes: SIMOTICS SD Severe Duty motor designed for the harshest industrial environments. IEEE 841 compliance makes it suitable for petroleum and chemical processing installations. Cast iron construction with corrosion-resistant epoxy coating handles outdoor, high-humidity, and mildly corrosive atmospheres. Class H insulation with Class F rise provides exceptional thermal margin. Oversized bearings with grease fittings extend maintenance intervals. Space heater prevents condensation during shutdown. IP56 rating exceeds standard TEFC protection. Stainless steel shaft sleeve prevents shaft corrosion in humid environments.

products.name: SIMOTICS S-1FK7 Compact Servo Motor
products.description: Compact permanent-magnet synchronous servo motor for high-dynamic motion control applications. 4.7 Nm rated torque, 3000 RPM rated speed, with 22-bit absolute encoder integrated. Designed for use with SINAMICS S120 and S210 servo drives in SIMATIC automation environments. Ideal for packaging, printing, handling, and general motion control.

ambient_temperature_max_c.display: 40 deg C (60 deg C with derating)

products.applicationNotes: SIMOTICS S-1FK7 is Siemens' compact servo motor series for high-performance motion control. Integrated 22-bit absolute encoder provides extreme positioning accuracy (better than 0.001 degree). DRIVE-CLiQ digital interface enables automatic motor recognition and one-click commissioning with SINAMICS drives. IP65 rating allows use in washdown and dusty environments without additional protection. Holding brake prevents motion when drive is unpowered (safety and gravity-loaded axes). The 1FK7 range covers torques from 0.5 Nm to 100+ Nm across multiple frame sizes. Best paired with SINAMICS S120 for multi-axis systems or SINAMICS S210 for single-axis applications.

products.name: WEG W22 NEMA Premium Efficiency Motor
products.description: 7.5 HP (5.5 kW), 4-pole, NEMA 213T frame, TEFC, NEMA Premium Efficiency three-phase AC induction motor. WEG W22 series featuring the innovative WEG W22 cooling system design with optimized fin geometry for superior heat dissipation. Cast iron frame for durability. One of the most popular general-purpose motors worldwide, known for excellent price-to-performance ratio and fast delivery.
products.applicationNotes: WEG W22 is the world's most popular IEC/NEMA motor platform, sold in over 100 countries. The W22 cooling fin design provides up to 15% better heat dissipation than conventional designs, enabling a smaller frame size for the same power rating in some cases. Cast iron construction standard for NEMA T-frame sizes. Known for competitive pricing and short lead times due to WEG's vertically integrated manufacturing and global warehousing. Three-phase 208-230/460V winding accommodates all common North American supply voltages.

products.name: WEG W22 NEMA Premium 50 HP Motor
products.description: 50 HP (37 kW), 4-pole, NEMA 326T frame, TEFC, NEMA Premium Efficiency three-phase AC induction motor. Heavy-duty cast iron construction suitable for demanding industrial applications. WEG W22 design with optimized airflow, low vibration, and high reliability. Ideal for large pump, fan, compressor, and crusher applications.

construction.display: Cast Iron Frame and End Shields

products.applicationNotes: 50 HP motor suitable for medium to heavy industrial applications. At this power level, the W22's efficient cooling design helps keep operating temperature low, extending bearing and insulation life. Regreasable bearings allow extended maintenance intervals in heavy-duty service. 326T frame provides a rigid mounting platform for demanding applications. Cast iron construction handles vibration and mechanical stress better than aluminum alternatives. WEG typically offers significantly shorter lead times than European and Japanese competitors for this size range, often stocking common configurations in North American warehouses.

products.name: WEG W22 Explosion Proof Motor
products.description: 125 HP (90 kW), 4-pole, NEMA 286JM frame, XPFC (Explosion Proof Fan Cooled), NEMA Premium Efficiency three-phase induction motor. UL listed for Class I, Division 1, Groups C and D hazardous locations. C-Face (JM) mounting for direct coupling to pumps. Designed for petrochemical, refinery, paint and coating, and grain handling applications where explosive atmospheres may be present.

hazardous_location_class.value: Class I, Division 1, Groups C & D
hazardous_location_class.display: Class I, Div 1, Groups C & D

temperature_code.display: T3C (160 deg C max surface temp)

inverter_duty.display: Yes - suitable for VFD (consult manufacturer for hazloc VFD requirements)

construction.display: Heavy Cast Iron with Explosion-Proof Conduit Boxes

products.applicationNotes: Explosion-proof motor for hazardous locations where flammable gases or vapors may be present (Class I, Division 1). T3C temperature code ensures maximum surface temperature stays below autoignition temperature of most common flammable gases in Groups C and D (hydrogen excluded -- that requires Group B). JM (C-Face) mounting allows direct coupling to ANSI pumps without a separate coupling or guard. Space heater prevents moisture condensation during extended shutdowns, critical for explosion-proof integrity. Note: When using with a VFD in a hazardous location, the entire drive system must be evaluated for hazardous area compliance. Consult WEG and the drive manufacturer for approved combinations.

products.name: U.S. MOTORS Hostile Duty TEFC Motor
products.description: 15 HP, 4-pole, NEMA 254T frame, TEFC, NEMA Premium Efficiency three-phase induction motor from the U.S. MOTORS Hostile Duty line. Designed for the most demanding industrial environments with heavy cast iron construction, oversized conduit box, and copper windings. Well-suited for pump, fan, and compressor applications in manufacturing, mining, and water/wastewater facilities.

construction.display: Cast Iron Frame and End Shields

products.applicationNotes: U.S. MOTORS Hostile Duty line is designed for tough industrial environments where reliability and uptime are critical. Cast iron construction withstands vibration and mechanical stress. Oversized conduit box accommodates large gauge wire for easy field wiring. Copper bar rotor provides excellent efficiency and starting characteristics. The U.S. MOTORS brand (Nidec) has an enormous installed base in North American water/wastewater, HVAC, and general manufacturing, making replacement parts and service widely available. Compatible with the existing Emerson/US Motors foot-print for drop-in replacement scenarios.

products.name: Marathon Blue Chip XRI TEFC Motor
products.description: 3 HP, 4-pole, NEMA 182T frame, TEFC, NEMA Premium Efficiency three-phase induction motor. Marathon Blue Chip XRI (Extra Rugged Industrial) series with cast iron frame, robust conduit box design, and inverter-grade insulation system. A staple of the North American industrial motor market with broad distribution availability.
products.applicationNotes: Marathon Blue Chip XRI is one of the most widely stocked industrial motors in North America, available through virtually every industrial distributor. The 3 HP / 182T frame size is the most commonly sold motor in the industrial market, used in thousands of pump, fan, and conveyor applications. Cast iron frame provides durability that exceeds aluminum frame alternatives at this size. Inverter-grade insulation system handles the voltage spikes from VFD operation. Marathon brand motors have deep cross-reference compatibility with legacy Emerson, Baldor, and Reliance motors in the same frame sizes.

products.name: Leeson DC Permanent Magnet Motor
products.description: 1 HP, 90VDC, 1800 RPM permanent magnet DC motor with TENV enclosure. Leeson DC permanent magnet motors are widely used in packaging, material handling, and conveyor applications where smooth speed control from a DC controller or SCR drive is required. NEMA 56C face mount for direct coupling to gearboxes and driven equipment.
products.applicationNotes: Leeson DC PM motors provide smooth, linear speed control when powered by an SCR-type DC speed controller. The permanent magnet field eliminates the need for a separate field supply, simplifying the drive system. TENV enclosure is sealed without an external fan, making it quiet and suitable for clean environments. 56C face mount allows direct attachment to speed reducers, conveyor gearboxes, and other C-face equipment. Speed is controlled by varying the armature voltage (0-90VDC). Brushes require periodic inspection and replacement (typical life 2,000-5,000 hours depending on application). Note: DC motors are gradually being replaced by AC inverter duty or BLDC motors in new installations, but the massive installed base of DC drives ensures continued demand for replacements.
